name: Sealing
description:
If @{const}{gbp}{[Stat -X]} would be applied to target foe as a result of an attack made with this weapon, where Stat is not Mov, instead apply @{const}{gbp}{[Stat -(X + 2)]} to target foe.

If weapon is an Axe, Lance, or Sword with the Ranged property, ignore Mt penalty.

modifiers.mt: bothif fill is_hidden() then 0 else -3 end

comment: Items in modifers should be integers
